thread.title: 2 Nights
thread.title_full: 2 Nights - Review of Hotel Aiglon - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jasmino919
title: 2 Nights
text: I stayed at this lovely hotel for 2 nights with a couple of friends. This hotel has parking at around â‚¬35 euros a night which is just 50 or so metres to the right of the hotel. I would recommend booking in advance as there are limited spaces. The room (31) was very spacious - with a separate toilet, bathroom with double sinks, bath and shower and then the bedroom which had a double bed and pull out chair as a single bed. We enjoyed a lovely buffet breakfast with a selection of pastries, cereal, fruit, yoghurts and some hot food.
